org.aksw.iguana.rp.metrics

Class MetricFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.aksw.iguana.rp.metrics.MetricFactory

  • public class MetricFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This Factory will create Metrics from the ClassLoader
    Author:
    f.conrads

      static MetricManager createManager(MetricManager mmanager)

      static Metric createMetric(java.lang.String name)
      This will try to get the metric from
      1.
      static Metric createMetric(java.lang.String name, StorageManager sManager)
      Will create a Metric either from Properties or ClassName with the Storage manager
      static Metric createMetricFromClassName(java.lang.String name)
      Will simply create a Metric via ClassLoader
      static Metric createMetricFromProperties(java.lang.String name)
      Will create a metric from properties if name="metric1"
      then there must be the key: metric1.class=...
      This key must have the class Name of the Metric

      and optional constructors can be defined by: metric1.constructorArgs=...

    • Method Detail

      • createMetric

        public static Metric createMetric(java.lang.String name)
        This will try to get the metric from
        1. name as a key in the metrics properties
        2. if not exists: name as a class name

        Parameters:
        name - Either the key in the metrics properties file or the class name
        Returns:
        The Metric to the name or null

      • createMetric

        public static Metric createMetric(java.lang.String name,
                                  StorageManager sManager)
        Will create a Metric either from Properties or ClassName with the Storage manager
        Parameters:
        name -
        sManager -
        Returns:

      • createMetricFromClassName

        public static Metric createMetricFromClassName(java.lang.String name)
        Will simply create a Metric via ClassLoader
        Parameters:
        name - class Name of the metric
        Returns:

      • createMetricFromProperties

        public static Metric createMetricFromProperties(java.lang.String name)
        Will create a metric from properties if name="metric1"
        then there must be the key: metric1.class=...
        This key must have the class Name of the Metric

        and optional constructors can be defined by: metric1.constructorArgs=...
        Parameters:
        name - base key of the metric in the properties file
        Returns:
